select u.id uid,u.username,u.avatar,r.id rid,r.name rname,r.code,f.id fid,f.name fname from m_user u,m_role r,m_faculty f where u.role_id= r.id and f.id=u.faculty_id and u.admin =false
and u.id = #{id}
and u.username like concat(#{username},'%')
and r.code like concat(#{role},'%')
and f.name like concat(#{faculty},'%')
select avatar from m_user where id=#{id};
select count(*) from m_user where username=#{username}
select count(*) from m_user where faculty_id=#{id}
select u.id uid,u.username,u.avatar,r.id rid,r.name rname,f.id fid,f.name fname from m_user u,m_role r,m_faculty f where u.role_id= r.id and f.id=u.faculty_id and faculty_id = #{id}
select avatar from m_user where username = #{username}
select u.id uid,u.username,u.avatar,r.id rid,r.name rname,f.id fid,f.name fname from m_user u,m_role r,m_faculty f where u.role_id= r.id and f.id=u.faculty_id
mapper.insert: insert into m_user(username, password, faculty_id, admin, avatar, role_id) VALUES(#{username},#{password},#{faculty.id},#{admin},#{avatar},#{role.id})
mapper.select: select u.id uid, u.username,u.avatar, f.id fid,f.name fname, r.id rid,r.name rname,r.code from m_user u ,m_faculty f,m_role r,m_meeting_user mu where u.faculty_id =f.id and u.role_id = r.id and mu.user_id = u.id and mu.meeting_id = #{id} order by u.id

select m.id from m_meeting m,m_meeting_user mu,m_user u where m.id = mu.meeting_id and u.id = mu.user_id and approval_status != '审核未通过' and u.id=#{user_id} and m.id!=#{meeting_id} and (#{start} BETWEEN m.start AND m.end OR #{end} BETWEEN m.start AND m.end OR m.start BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} OR m.end BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end})

select u.id uid, u.username,u.avatar, f.id fid,f.name fname, r.id rid,r.name rname,r.code from m_user u ,m_faculty f,m_role r,m_message me where u.faculty_id =f.id and u.role_id = r.id and me.addressee = u.id and me.id=#{id}
